API.base¶

fritter.base.create_post()¶

Used to create a post.

Parameters

body (post) – supply a body text for this post

Returns

status (0 good, 1 bad, check docs for login_required)

Return type

{‘status’: (int)}

fritter.base.delete_post()¶

Used to delete a post.

Parameters

id (post) – id of the post

Returns

status (0 good, 1 bad, check docs for login_required)

Return type

{‘status’: (int)}

fritter.base.get_posts()¶

Gets posts.

Parameters

authors (post) – optionally get posts belonging to multiple authors.

Returns

array of posts

Return type

JSON array

fritter
